channel.title: How do i make magic req runes?
channel.description: how do i make magic req regular runes becasue rite now u dont need any runes for magic plz post ur idias and suggestions. ty

item.title: How do i make magic req runes?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

                          } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true)
                                    && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true)
                                    && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) {

Use your brain to put that where it is supposed to go. The 500 numbers are the rune id, andn the 2nd number is the number of runes required. To make it delete the runes after cast:

deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6);

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make magic req runes?
